kpi.name: LTE_693a

kpi_info.title: Nr Rcv VLAN Intf PHB_Class_BE PKTS
kpi_info.use: The number of Best Effort packets that were successfully received. The KPI is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN interface of the BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: Nr Rcv VLAN Intf PHB_Class_BE PKTS
